sentences.english: The Lord frustrates the plans of the nations and brings to nothing the peoples' designs.

sentences.english: The Lord made his people fruitful and much stronger than their foes.
sentences.chinese: 上主使他的百姓昌旺，比他们的仇敌更强壮。

sentences.english: May the Lord grant that he will find mercy from the Lord on that day!
sentences.chinese: 愿主使他在那日得主的怜悯。

sentences.english: The Lord has sent a message against Jacob; it will fall on Israel.

sentences.chinese: 他不愿猜测谁是幕后主使者。

sentences.english: A bloodbath took place when the leaders of the plot surrendered.
